name: Finding Kiwi
description:
Martin is an astronaut who participates in an expedition to a new planet. Her best friend, Kiwi the little dog, accompanies him on this adventure.

One day, Martin decided to leave his comfortable seat in the spaceship to go out for a walk but, just opening the door, Kiwi ran away. Now, for obvious reasons, you have to go find her.

A 1 week game, developed by:

Gael Trevino Prieto @iamgaeltpp->  Game Designer & Programmer

Nestor Arellano @asoretzu->  Game Designer & Producer

Oxrok - >  2D Artist 

Daniel Quiaro  @Quiarom2D_3D ->  2D Artist & Music

Andrés David Castillo @visualdavid - >  illustrator Artist

Extras: Background music by  Timbeek
